name: Sami Illsome VN Sprite [Free]
description:
‘Sami Illsome’  is a visual novel sprite you may use for anything you’d like, be it your game, mod, writing, etc. Feel free to change her name as well if it doesn’t fit your needs. There may be more outfits for Sami that will come out in the future for special occasions (such as Halloween, Christmas, etc.), however I make no guarantee if they will be free or not.

Only one pose this time since this is my first sprite.

What’s Included:

This Sami sprite includes one pose, three different outfits (bikini/swimwear, casual Sami outfit, sailor school uniform), five different eye variations (closed, narrow, open, wide, winking), and eight mouth variations (smile, frown, open mouth, open smile, cat smile, 3 grinch smiles). 

Everything included are transparent PNG images divided into organized folders, all compressed as a zip file.

Sprite Dimensions:

The sprite comes in the following dimensions (in pixels): 1233 x 2220. The sprite can be resized to fit your needs. 

A resized version of the sprite is also available (411 x 740) optimized for use on a 1280 x 720 ratio screen.

Terms of Usage:

You may...

  • Share, copy, and redistribute this sprite (‘Sami Illsome’) in any way.
  • Modify, change, transform, and build upon any aspect of this sprite.
  • Use this sprite for commercial and non-commercial use/projects.

Under the following terms...

  • You must give proper credit to me, the artist (either by name ‘Zayda Senpai’ or by a link to my social media).
  • You may not credit yourself as the creator of this sprite.
  • You must indicate if changes or modifications were made.

Summary: Sami is free for you to use in any way you’d like as long as proper credit is given.

---

If you have any questions or concerns about the terms mentioned above, I can be easily reached through Twitter, Instagram, Discord, or email. 

If you’d like to be updated on when a new sprite or asset is coming out, or want to make suggestions, follow my Twitter or Instagram~

Thank you for using my sprite for your project!
